constituent: celebrate, altar, elder brother, teenager, mouth, human legs
koohiiStory1: It´s a Bar Mitzvah. At the altar, the teenager is singing in his awful, mid-puberty voice. We´ll all celebrate when that part is over!
koohiiStory2: When Japanese people turn 20 they usually visit the altar at their local shrine and celebrate no longer being a teenager.
readingExamples: 祝賀 (しゅくが), 祝日 (しゅくじつ), 慶祝 (けいしゅく), 祝う (いわ.う)
words:
祝賀(しゅくが): celebration, congratulations
祝い(いわい): celebration, festival
祝う(いわう): congratulate, celebrate
祝日(しゅくじつ): national holiday
お祝い(おいわい): celebration
